CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 18, 1956, pg. A27, reads: "Pitt's Arnie Sowell, left, and Duquesne's Si Green, both All-American athletes, listen attentively to Mayor David L. Lawrence before the start of the Dapper Dan sports banquet at the Hotel William Penn Sunday night. Sowell and Green were honored for their standout contributions to sports. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Arnold "Arnie" Sowell, Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, and Sihugo "Si" Green, gathered for Dapper Dan sports banquet at William Penn Hotel, Downtown
CatSubject_tab: Lawrence, David Leo, 1889-1966.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Windows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Blinds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Curtains--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Sowell, Arnold.Green, Si.William Penn Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Young adults--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Athletes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
